page.title: 19WHITBOURNE SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: {Whitbourne School}was built as a charity school in the early 1800's. Life in the school today is very different from what is was a hundred uears ago.Unlike other village schools,our school is still growing. In{mathematics}lessons we are encouraged to do lots of practical work using a variety of equipment.We are helped in understanding the subject rather than learning it by heart. {Reading and writing}are more interesting.Books are more colourful and stories more exciting. We do{science}in the primary school today.This term some children have been learning about spiders.First of all they had to know where to find them and go and look for them.Then the spiders were brought back to school and the children looked at them
